version_description:
- Totally new look.
- New calendar history.
- Leaderboard to challenge your friends.
- More personalization options for optimal motivation!
- Workout reminders.
- Bug fixes

- Totally new look.
- New calendar history.
- Leaderboard to challenge your friends.
- More personalization options for optimal motivation!
- Workout reminders.
- Bug fixes

This update includes

Features
* New Leaderboard screen.
* Added haptic feedback to charts.

Bug Fixes
* Fixed a crash with setting reminders.
* Reduced app size.
* Performance improvements.

This update includes

Features
* New Leaderboard screen.
* Added haptic feedback to charts.

Bug Fixes
* Fixed a crash with setting reminders.
* Reduced app size.
* Performance improvements.

This Update includes

Features
* Ability to delete workouts from the calendar.
* Ability to delete workouts from the summary screen.
* Ability to reset all data from settings.

Bugs Fixes
* Fixed a bug with the calendar detail not

This Update includes

Features
* Ability to delete workouts from the calendar.
* Ability to delete workouts from the summary screen.
* Ability to reset all data from settings.

Bugs Fixes
* Fixed a bug with the calendar detail not

This Update includes

Features
* New Stats screen with graphs for weekly, monthly, and yearly push-ups!
* Easily check lifetime push-up count, lifetime highest rep, and lifetime workout count!

Bug Fixes
* Fixed a bug with the calenda

This Update includes

Features
* New Stats screen with graphs for weekly, monthly, and yearly push-ups!
* Easily check lifetime push-up count, lifetime highest rep, and lifetime workout count!

Bug Fixes
* Fixed a bug with the calenda

2.3.9
This Update includes

Features
* Health app integration!
* Sync your workouts and active energy to the Apple Health app!
* See your push-up workouts in the Apple Activity app!
* More accurate calorie calculations!
* New home

2.3.9
This Update includes

Features
* Health app integration!
* Sync your workouts and active energy to the Apple Health app!
* See your push-up workouts in the Apple Activity app!
* More accurate calorie calculations!
* New home

Features:
* The stats graph now scrolls back to previous weeks/months/years.
* Added manual push-up entry. This feature is currently available from the Calendar detail.
* Updated UI for iOS 13.0
Bug Fixes:
* Fixed a small bug with the Calen

Features:
* The stats graph now scrolls back to previous weeks/months/years.
* Added manual push-up entry. This feature is currently available from the Calendar detail.
* Updated UI for iOS 13.0
Bug Fixes:
* Fixed a small bug with the Calen

Feature:
* New rest timer that allows you to pause workouts.
Bug Fixes:
* Fixed an issue with friend invite links on iOS 13+ devices.
* Fixed crash on the Calendar detail screen.
* Small performance improvements.

Feature:
* New rest timer that allows you to pause workouts.
Bug Fixes:
* Fixed an issue with friend invite links on iOS 13+ devices.
* Fixed crash on the Calendar detail screen.
* Small performance improvements.

Features:
* New global leaderboards with Game Center profile photos!
* New sound option in Settings.
* New summary stat for daily total push-ups.
* Increased font size throughout the app.
Bug Fixes:

Features
* Added Apple Health settings option. This will help you setup and manage Health App integration.
* Added the ability to set Monday as the first day of the week.
Bug Fixes
* Fixed bug where Push-Ups would be hidden when iCloud was tur

Features
* Added Apple Health settings option. This will help you setup and manage Health App integration.
* Added the ability to set Monday as the first day of the week.
Bug Fixes
* Fixed bug where Push-Ups would be hidden when iCloud was tur

Features
* New push-up detection method. You can now switch from Proximity Sensor detection to Face Detection which will use your camera to track distance to your face.
* Adjust your rest timer default value from settings.
* Added push-up reminde

Features
* New push-up detection method. You can now switch from Proximity Sensor detection to Face Detection which will use your camera to track distance to your face.
* Adjust your rest timer default value from settings.
* Added push-up reminde

Features
* Automatic rest detection will pause your workout if you haven’t done a push-up in a while. This will automatically start your next set when you return from the pause.
* Added new sound for when the rest timer starts and finishes.
Bug

* Added new sound for when the rest timer starts and finishes.
Bug

Features
* Added setting to disable automatic pause detection.
* Added a restore push-ups from server back up in Settings.
* Added a button to disable global leaderboards.
* Added sound previews on the Settings tab.
Bug Fixes
* Adjusted

Features
* New Apple Watch app!
* Feel haptic feedback on your wrist when a push-up is counted.
* See your BPM during workouts. Heart rate is also logged to the Health app.
* Added Apple Watch Complications to view your daily push-up count on

Features
* New Apple Watch app!
* Feel haptic feedback on your wrist when a push-up is counted.
* See your BPM during workouts. Heart rate is also logged to the Health app.

Features
* New stats!
* Weekly average push-ups per workout and per set.
* Monthly average push-ups per workout and per set.
* Yearly average push-ups per workout and per set.
* All time average push-ups per workout and per set.
* Avera
